name: Titanic Hydra
tooltip:
Titanic Hydra

Cost: 3300
+30 Attack Damage
+500 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Colossus: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 1% of maximum health.

UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal ( 5 / 3.75) (+ ( 1.5% / 1.125%) maximum health) bonus physical damage on-hit to your target and ( 40 / 30) (+ ( 3% / 2.25%) maximum health) bonus physical damage to other enemies in a cone on-hit. Cleave's damage also applies to structures.
